Clipped from: [https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/index.htm](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/index.htm)

![Photo of Kollontai](data:image/png;base64,)

Works:

1907-1916: [International Socialist Conferences of Women Workers](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1907/is-conferences.htm) 1908: [Introduction to “The Social Basis of the Women’s Question”](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1908/social-basis.htm) 1909: [The Social Basis of the Women’s Question](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1909/social-basis.htm) 1911: [Love and the New Morality](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1911/new-morality.htm) 1912: [The International Proletariat and War](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1912/international-war.htm) 1913: [Women’s Day](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1913/womens-day.htm) 1914: [The War and Our Immediate Tasks](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1914/wartime.htm) 1914-1916: [A Giant Mind, a Giant Will](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1914/giant.htm) 1915: [Who Needs the War?](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1915/whoneeds.htm) 1915: [Why was the German proletariat silent in the July Days?](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1915/july.htm) 1915: [Preface to the Book Society and Motherhood](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1915/mother.htm) 1915: [The Third International](https://www.marxists.org/history/usa/parties/spusa/1915/1023-kollontai-thirdint.pdf) (PDF)  
 1916: [The Statue of Liberty](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1916/statue-liberty.htm) 1916: [Do Internationalists Want a Split?](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1916/split.htm) 1916: [Working Woman and Mother](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1916/working-mother.htm) 1917: [Our Memorial to the Fighters for Freedom](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1917/memorial.htm) 1917: [Our Tasks](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1917/tasks.htm) 1917: [Lenin at Smolny](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1917/lenin-smolny.htm) 1917: [Why the Bolsheviks Must Win](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1917/bolsheviks-win.htm) 1918: [The First Steps Towards the Protection of Motherhood](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1918/steps-motherhood.htm) 1918: [V.I. Lenin and the First Congress of Women Workers](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1918/congress.htm) 1918: [Decree on Child Welfare](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1918/immoral.htm) 1918: [New Woman](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1918/new-morality.htm) (from The New Morality and the Working Class)  
 1919: [Women Workers Struggle For Their Rights](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1919/women-workers/index.htm) 1919: [What Are We Fighting For?](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1919/fighting.htm) 1919: [History of the movement of Women workers in Russia](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1919/history.htm) 1920: [International Women’s Day](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1920/womens-day.htm) 1920: [Communism and the Family](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1920/communism-family.htm) (more complete version)  
 1920: [Communism and the Family](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1920/family.htm) 1920: [An Interesting Letter from Russia](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1920/letter-from-russia.htm) 1921: [The Labour of Women in the Evolution of the Economy](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1921/evolution.htm) 1921: [Prostitution and ways of fighting it](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1921/prostitution.htm) 1921: [Letter to Dora Montefiore](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1921/letter-montefiore.htm) 1921: [Workers’ Opposition](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1921/workers-opposition/index.htm) 1921: [The Woman Worker and Peasant in Soviet Russia](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1921/peasant.htm) 1921: [Theses on Communist Morality in the Sphere of Marital Relations](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1921/theses-morality.htm) 1921: [Sexual Relations and the Class Struggle](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1921/sex-class-struggle.htm) 1921: [The Activity of the International Secretariat of Communist Women](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1921/11/intwomsec.html) 1922: [Soon (In 48 years’ time)](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1922/soon.htm) 1923: [Make way for Winged Eros: A Letter to Working Youth](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1923/winged-eros.htm) 1926: [Autobiography of a Sexually Emancipated Communist Woman](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1926/autobiography.htm) 1927: [Red Love](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/red-love/index.htm) 1927: [Women fighters in the days of the Great October Revolution](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1927/fighters.htm) 1927: [What has the October Revolution done for Women in the West?](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1927/october.htm) 1929: [Great Love](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1929/great/index.htm) 1946: [The Soviet Woman – a Full and Equal Citizen of Her Country](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1946/full.htm) 1946: [Lenin Thought of Both Great and Small](https://www.marxists.org/archive/kollonta/1946/lenin.htm)
